_meta.description: This file controls all Insights page content, section assignment, sorting behavior, routing, and CTA logic. Each report is rendered exactly once per page load using sequential section assignment. Generated from CSV files in content/csv/ and merged with existing reports.
_meta.source: CSV files in content/csv/ (recursive glob pattern: **/*.csv). Reports can also be manually added to this JSON file.
notes: All reports appear in exactly one section per render (Insights Hero → Featured → Case Studies → Research → Recent Articles).
Recent Articles is a derived sink containing all unassigned reports, sorted normally.
Case Studies are identified solely by placement === 'Case Studies' and use a dedicated layout and CTA everywhere.
If report type is 'Case Study', placement must be 'Case Studies'. Verify consistency between type and placement fields.
CSV files are the source of truth. When regenerating, CSV data overwrites existing reports with matching IDs.
Reports can be manually added to this JSON, but will be overwritten if a CSV row with the same ID is processed.

fields.id: REQUIRED. Unique stable identifier for the report. Used for deterministic sorting and tie-breaking. Must be unique across all reports.
fields.slug: REQUIRED. Unique URL slug used for routing. Generates the route /insights/:slug. Must be unique across all reports.
fields.type: REQUIRED. Human-readable classification such as 'Research Report', 'Case Study', or 'Article'. Display-only.
fields.date: REQUIRED. Canonical publish date stored as ISO 'YYYY-MM-DD' (Asia/Kolkata date-only). Used for sorting and display.
fields.title: REQUIRED. Primary headline displayed on cards and detail page hero section.
fields.description: REQUIRED. Short summary shown on cards and in the detail page hero section.
fields.contentFormat: REQUIRED. Controls CTA behavior for non-case-study reports: 'downloadable' or 'non-downloadable'. Ignored for Case Studies.
fields.industry: REQUIRED. Industry label used for display and for dynamic file path construction. No hardcoded industry list.
fields.image: REQUIRED. Card image URL. Must start with /insights/image/. Auto-resolves file extensions (.png, .jpg, .jpeg, .svg, .webp, .gif).
fields.placement: REQUIRED. Primary section eligibility. One of: 'Insights Hero', 'Featured Insights', 'Case Studies', 'In-Depth Research Reports', 'Recent Articles'.
fields.priority: OPTIONAL. Number (default 0). Higher values rank higher within the same section and Recent Articles.
fields.pinned: OPTIONAL. Boolean (default false). Pinned reports rank above all others within their section and Recent Articles.
fields.mdxSlug: OPTIONAL. Maps to MDX content at src/web-articles/<Industry>/<filename>.mdx. Used for article and case study detail pages. Format: 'Industry/filename' (without .mdx extension).
fields.mdSlug: OPTIONAL. Alternative to mdxSlug for markdown files in content/insights-md/. Used for markdown-based insights.
fields.taggings: OPTIONAL. List of topic tags shown under the hero description on detail pages. Can be array or comma-separated string.

validationRules.idUniqueness: Each report must have a unique id. Duplicate IDs within CSV files will cause generation to fail.
validationRules.slugUniqueness: Each report must have a unique slug. Slug collisions will cause generation to fail.
validationRules.dateFormat: Date must match format: 'YYYY-MM-DD' (Asia/Kolkata date-only). Regex: /^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/
validationRules.imagePath: Image path must start with /insights/image/. File extension is auto-resolved if not specified.
validationRules.linkPath: If link is provided, it must point to /public/insights/reports/<Industry>/ and file must exist on disk.
validationRules.placementValues: placement must be one of: 'Insights Hero', 'Featured Insights', 'Case Studies', 'In-Depth Research Reports', 'Recent Articles'.
validationRules.caseStudyConsistency: If type is 'Case Study', placement must be 'Case Studies'.

generationRules.sourceOfTruth: CSV files in content/csv/ are the source of truth for report data
generationRules.mergeBehavior: Reports from CSV overwrite existing reports with the same ID. Reports not in CSV are preserved.
generationRules.mdxGeneration: MDX files are auto-generated to src/web-articles/ when section_* columns are present in CSV or mdxSlug is specified
generationRules.imageResolution: Image paths are auto-resolved to find files with common extensions (.png, .jpg, .jpeg, .svg, .webp, .gif) if extension is missing

caseStudyRules.cardCTA: Always 'Read Full Case Study' (including when shown in Recent Articles).
caseStudyRules.ctaBehavior: Shows a single CTA such as 'Talk to Us' linking to /contact.
caseStudyRules.contentFormatHandling: contentFormat is ignored entirely for Case Studies.

sortingRules.randomness: No Math.random() is used. Sorting is stable across reloads.
